channel.title: [508] Trying to find variable that holds the username
channel.description:
Hello everyone, For the past few hours, I've been trying to find the variable used to store the username of the currently logged in character in a 508 client.
Anyone have any experience with anything like this?
Thanks in advance.

item.title: [508] Trying to find variable that holds the username
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote="-shock-, post:6, topic:325237"][quote author=licorish55 link=topic=421574.msg3096183#msg3096183 date=1263337623]
allowed*
[/quote]
You’re real helpful, you bash a guy who actually has something to contribute just because he spelled something incorrectly?[/quote]

Yes.

Read full topic
